featured.text: A movement of 25 a few millimeters (mm) of the earth’s crust is a sign of possible earthquakes.

definition.zh_def: 毫米，等於一米的千分之一。
definition.en_def: A millimeter is a unit of length in the metric system, equal to one thousandth of a meter.
definition.example: The thickness of a credit card is about 0.76 millimeters.
